title: Project-Based Blended Learning Course for Cultivating Creative Entrepreneurs

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic entrepreneurship concepts and digital device proficiency (smartphone level)
context.additional_context: Entrepreneurship education in smartphone-centric constrained environments, featuring real-case analysis and team project-based learning

learning_goals: Learners can apply the design thinking process to identify at least three solutions for entrepreneurial idea generation.
Through project-based blended learning, learners can analyze real-world startup scenarios and design viable business models.
Learners can collaboratively draft a business plan and deliver a 5-minute pitch presentation as a team.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
